sql: SELECT MIN(mi.info) AS movie_budget, MIN(mi_idx.info) AS movie_votes, MIN(kt.kind) AS movie_type, MIN(t.title) AS violent_liongate_movie FROM cast_info ci, company_name cn, info_type it1, info_type it2, keyword k, movie_companies mc, movie_info mi, movie_info_idx mi_idx, movie_keyword mk, title t, kind_type kt WHERE ci.note in ('(writer)', '(head writer)', '(written by)', '(story)', '(story editor)') AND cn.name like 'Lionsgate%' AND it1.info = 'genres' AND it2.info = 'votes' AND k.keyword in ('murder', 'violence', 'blood', 'gore', 'death', 'female-nudity', 'hospital') AND mc.note like '%(Blu-ray)%' AND mi.info in ('Horror', 'Thriller') AND t.production_year < 2006 and (t.title like '%Freddy%' or t.title like '%Jason%' or t.title like 'Saw%') AND t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id AND t.id = ci.movie_id AND t.id = mk.movie_id AND t.id = mc.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mk.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = mk.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND mi_idx.movie_id = mk.movie_id AND mi_idx.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND it1.id = mi.info_type_id AND it2.id = mi_idx.info_type_id AND k.id = mk.keyword_id AND cn.id = mc.company_id AND t.kind_id =kt.id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(mk mi it1 k kt t mi_idx mc ci cn it2)
 HashJoin(mk mi it1 k kt t mi_idx mc ci cn)
 MergeJoin(kt t mi_idx mc ci cn)
 MergeJoin(kt t mi_idx mc ci)
 MergeJoin(mc ci)
 HashJoin(kt t mi_idx)
 MergeJoin(t mi_idx)
 HashJoin(mk mi it1 k)
 MergeJoin(mk mi it1)
 HashJoin(mk mi)
 IndexScan(mk)
 IndexScan(mi)
 BitmapScan(it1)
 BitmapScan(k)
 TidScan(kt)
 IndexScan(t)
 TidScan(mi_idx)
 IndexScan(mc)
 TidScan(ci)
 IndexScan(cn)
 BitmapScan(it2)
 Leading((((((mk mi) it1) k) (((kt (t mi_idx)) (mc ci)) cn)) it2)) */
